attributes.title: App is faulty with many many bugs
attributes.review: Can’t support a person who doesn’t know how to do their job and also supports hate, hope you get an exorcism; god help your soul.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE
attributes.review: I am distraught by the quality of this app. after taking 47 hours to download it asked me to kindly sacrifice my first born and drain the blood from my husband’s neck. 0/10 would not recommend to anyone.

attributes.title: He almost killed me
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app a bunch of police came to my house and raped me 🥺I hope everybody doesn’t download this or something bad would happen

attributes.title: Ugly orange fat dude🍊🍊🍊
attributes.review: The app is very ugly💖just like trump is☺️it makes my mouth burn every time I say the word t-r-u-m-p🤢🤮and I think we need to fix America by getting rid of this app and the ugly fat racist piece of 💩 that they call the president😌💅🏽🙈and that on periodT with no tampon✨

attributes.title: Defund the app
attributes.review: I got on the app and it literally kept taking me back to the home screen so many glitches what’s going on🥰 also there is a very very ugly man every where on the app🧚🏽‍♀️💜

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP🚫❌
attributes.review: I downloaded this app at first just to see when the next rally in my town was and i instantly got hacked!!!! NOW I WOULD LIKE TO SPEAK TO THE MANAGER! I had to get a brand new phone and i don’t have that kind of money just laying around.

attributes.title: Slowed Down Phone
attributes.review: This app is not worth it. Took forever to download AND my phone was extremely slow after I used it. I think my phone has a virus 😞

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app directly caused the cognitive deterioration of at least 100,000 Americans who have also downloaded it. It has also been a catalyst to my depression and eventual suicide. This app should never have been made.

attributes.title: Ripoff
attributes.review: This is just is just a shameless ripoff of Hitler simulator 2019. Literally all the same features even the “leader” is a copy but lacks the subtlety of the original. Top 10 worst games I’ve ever played don’t get it it’s bad.
If I could leave a zero-star review, I would. This app made my phone crash and I had to restart it five times. This is a scam, and I can’t imagine how someone could like this.
